Translations.Text: (When li fulfilled his obligation li vojagx his famili Egypt). Li seg slope Mount Sinai fajr. Li dir al his famili Rest here. Mi seg fajr. Maybe mi bring vi news portion fajr varm vi
When li reached gxi li est vok rand tuj flank val ben makul brul bush located O Moses this est Me DI; Lord DE UNIVERS
Jxet down your stab. When li seg gxi mov like demon li torn around fled O Moses ven ne est afraid. Vi est perfectly sekur
Put your man into your posx; gxi ven blank blemish Fald your wings sald down your tim! These est 2 proofs el your Lord montr Pharaoh his elders ili est wicked popol
Li dir My Lord mi killed unu de them kaj mi tim lest ili kill me
Ankaux my frat Aaron est eloquent than mi. Send him me helper konfirm strengthen me Mi tim lest ili disbelieve me
Li dir Ni strengthen vi your frat ni proviz vi ambaux manifest auxtoritat. Tiel ili ne est able al tusx either unu de vi. Kun our mirakl 2 de vi together kun those sekv vi est victors
When Moses ir them our proofs klar profound ili dir This fabricated magic Ni neniam auxd this our antikv ancestors
Moses dir My Lord kon put who brought guidance Him est ultimate victors. Surely transgressors neniam sukces
Pharaoh dir O vi elders mi ne kon de any di vi ali than me Do fajr adobe O Hamaan en ord cxarpent tur ke mi pren jen di Moses Mi est sure ke li est liar
Tiel li his trup ad commit arrogance ter any dekstr opini ke ili ne returned us
Consequently ni pun him his trup jxet them into mar. Not consequences transgressors
Ni far them imams plumb their popol al Infer. Furthermore Tag Resurrection ili ne hav help
Ili incurred en this life condemnation Tag Resurrection ili despised
